sentences.en: Can’t it be done more quickly?
sentences.cn: 不能快一点吗？

sentences.en: getting more and more worried.
sentences.cn: 变得越来越忧虑

sentences.en: He spent more time perfecting his dance moves instead of gym work.
sentences.cn: 他用更多的时间来完善他的舞蹈动作而不是健身。

sentences.en: holds two tons, more or less.
sentences.cn: 大概能承两吨重

sentences.en: I don't want any more of that heavy stuff.
sentences.cn: 我再也不想碰那种麻烦事了。

sentences.en: I had no complaints and no more did Tom.
sentences.cn: 我没有什么可抱怨的，汤姆也没有。

sentences.en: I have no more questions.
sentences.cn: 我没问题了。

sentences.en: I shivered and pulled my scarf more tightly round my neck.
sentences.cn: 我打了个寒战，用围巾把脖子围得更紧了。

sentences.en: If a baby is thirsty, it feeds more often.
sentences.cn: 婴儿要是渴了，就会吃得更频繁。

sentences.en: If you build more plastics into cars, the car lasts longer.
sentences.cn: 如果汽车采用更多塑料元件，寿命会更长一些。

sentences.en: It was time now to show more political realism.
sentences.cn: 现在是拿出更多政治务实精神的时候了。

sentences.en: It would be difficult to find two men who were more dissimilar.
sentences.cn: 很难找到彼此间差异更大的人了。

sentences.en: Jovial ladies chivvy you into ordering more than you can eat!
sentences.cn: 热情的女招待会一再推荐，最后点的餐多到吃不下!

sentences.en: Let me adduce more evidence.
sentences.cn: 让我举出更多的证据。

sentences.en: mention his name no more to me.
sentences.cn: 别在我面前再提他的名字。

sentences.en: More and more people are surviving heart attacks.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的人在心脏病发作后存活下来。

sentences.en: More people would be attracted to cycling if conditions were right.
sentences.cn: 如果天气适宜，会有更多的人被吸引到骑自行车的行列中来。

sentences.en: Recent, more dramatic use of CGI was seen in "Walking With Dinosaurs".
sentences.cn: 在纪录片《与恐龙同行》中可以看到最新的、更加生动的电脑特效技术。

sentences.en: Selling goods abroad is no more difficult (= not more difficult ) than selling to the home market.
sentences.cn: 做外销和做内销一样不难。

sentences.en: She cares a lot more for her dogs than she does for me.
sentences.cn: 她关心她的狗远远超过关心我。

sentences.en: Thank God they're not on my manor any more.
sentences.cn: 谢天谢地，他们再也不在我的辖区里了。

sentences.en: The accident taught him to be more careful.
sentences.cn: 这起事故的教训使他变得更小心。

sentences.en: The film deserves more attention from the public.
sentences.cn: 这部影片应受到公众的更多注意。

sentences.en: Their replies were no more than grunts of acknowledgement.
sentences.cn: 他们所谓的回答不过是表示承认的咕哝罢了。

sentences.en: Then something seemed to snap in me. I couldn't endure any more.
sentences.cn: 这时候，我的心里像有个东西突然绷断了——我再也忍受不了啦。

sentences.en: there was no more to be said about it.
sentences.cn: 关于这件事，没有更多可说了。

sentences.en: They will not allow your more way-out ideas to pass unchallenged.
sentences.cn: 他们不会放过你这些古怪的念头的。

sentences.en: Things might have been different if I'd talked a bit more.
sentences.cn: 如果当时我再多说一点的话，结果或许会不一样。

sentences.en: This is more like a downpayment, or a deposit, if you like.
sentences.cn: 这更像是首付，也可以说是定金。

sentences.en: We ought to and can produce more petroleum.
sentences.cn: 我们应该并且能够生产更多的石油。

sentences.en: were more or less in agreement.
sentences.cn: 差不多达成一致

sentences.en: you must have some hot soup, but no more wine.
sentences.cn: 你要喝些热汤，但别再喝酒了。

sentences.en: You’ll have to be more careful next time.
sentences.cn: 你下次要更小心一点。

phrases.tran_cn: 需要更多信息；取得进一步资讯
达到，稳步增加的程度或等级
更多信息；详细信息；更多资料

trans.tran_cn: 更，更多，达到或处于更大的范围或程度，此外，更加
trans.tran_en: having a particular quality to a greater degree
You use more to indicate that there is a greater amount of something than before or than average, or than something else. You can use "a little," "a lot," "a bit," "far," and "much" in front of more.

trans.tran_cn: 更多的或附加的人或事物
trans.tran_en: indicate that there is a greater amount of something than before or than average, or than something else
